news_header: Israel bombed border crossings on the Syrian-Lebanese border, targeting smuggling routes to Hezbollah.
news_original_title: Tarkkailijajärjestö: Israel iskenyt laittomiin rajanylityksiin Libanonin rajalla
news_text: Israel has conducted airstrikes on the Syrian-Lebanese border, targeting illegal crossings used for smuggling weapons to Hezbollah. The strikes occurred in Wadi Khaled, Lebanon, and near Homs, Syria. This action is part of Israel's efforts to curb the flow of arms from Syria to Hezbollah, especially after a fragile truce was established last November. The situation escalated after Hezbollah lost a key smuggling route following the rebels' victory over Bashar al-Assad in December.
